attributes.action: scrap the road fund licence and replace it with higher fuel tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
road tax should be replaced with cerificate of insurance/mot certificate disc paid for as per road tax with reduced costi.e. £50 max. 
Revenue lost to be reclaimed by higher fuel duty ensuring that
 A.the more you use the road the more you pay
B.it will reduce the amount of cars on the road without insurance.
 Police could impound and arrest owners for non display of disc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
